fixes.name: Vega Up T FX
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR fxConversion = SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As])
VAR mv = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Vega Up T]
VAR mkt = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[marketCCY]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    fxConversion = "Reported", mv,
    fxConversion = "Natural",
        SWITCH(
            mkt,
            "AUD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_AUD],
            "BRL", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_BRL],
            "BRO", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_BRO],
            "CAD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
            "CHF", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CHF],
            "CLF", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CLF],
            "CLP", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CLP],
            "CNH", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CNH],
            "COP", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_COP],
            "CRC", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CRC],
            "EUR", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
            "GBP", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
            "HKD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_HKD],
            "INR", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_INR],
            "JPY", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_JPY],
            "KRW", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_KRW],
            "MXN", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXN],
            "MXC", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MXC],
            "MEX", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MEX],
            "MYR", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_MYR],
            "NZD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_NZD],
            "PEN", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_PEN],
            "SEK", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SEK],
            "SGD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_SGD],
            "USD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
            "UVR", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_UVR],
            "UYU", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_UYU],
            BLANK()
        ),
    fxConversion = "CAD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_CAD],
    fxConversion = "USD", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_USD],
    fxConversion = "EUR", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_EUR],
    fxConversion = "GBP", mv * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TO_GBP],
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('FXConversion'[Display As]) and implemented the CASE/WHEN logic using SWITCH and nested SWITCH for the marketCCY mappings. All field references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. Returned BLANK() where the original used null.
